text.textblock: For a copy of this report and further information regarding the International Research and Studies Program, write to Joseph F. Belmonte, Acting Director, Center for International Education, United States Department of Education, 400 Maryland Avenue, S.W., Washington, D.C. 20202-5247. Telephone number: (202) 732-6065.

Individuals who use a telecommunications device for the deaf (TDD) may call the Federal Information Relay Service (FIRS) at 1-800-877-8339 between 8 a.m. and 8 p.m., Eastern time, Monday through Friday.

signjob.textblock: Deputy Assistant Secretary for Postsecondary Education.
